About the Company: Medinova diagnostic services was established in the year 1985 as a pioneering concept in Diagnostics. For the first time in the country it offered all the diagnostic services from an ordinary blood test to a sophisticated CT Scan under one roof. With its, qualitative services for more than two decades and with innovative marketing efforts, Medinova has created a brand name for itself and is the pioneer in Medical Diagnostics in the Country. Today, doctors from across the length and breadth of the Country recommend Medinova to their patients; an ample testimony of the confidence that Medinova has enthused through its unmatched Services.
